title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Join Google's engineering team for a 12-week summer internship. Work on large-scale distributed systems, contribute to products used by billions. Requirements: Currently pursuing BS/MS in CS, strong coding skills in Python/Java/C++, understanding of data structures and algorithms.

title: Data Science Intern
description: Apply data science and machine learning to solve complex business problems at scale. Work with petabytes of data to drive product decisions. Requirements: Pursuing MS/PhD in Statistics, CS, or related field, proficiency in Python and SQL, experience with ML frameworks.

title: Software Development Engineer Intern
description: Design and build innovative technologies in a team environment. Work on real-world problems at massive scale. Requirements: Pursuing a degree in Computer Science or related field, proficiency in at least one programming language, strong problem-solving skills.

title: Data Science Intern
description: Use statistical modeling and machine learning to improve customer experience across Amazon. Work on recommendation systems, forecasting, and natural language processing. Requirements: MS/PhD in quantitative field, Python and SQL proficiency, experience with ML/statistical modeling.

title: SWE Intern - Summer 2026
description: Build products that connect billions of people. You'll work alongside experienced engineers on real projects. Looking for students with experience in mobile development, systems programming, or machine learning. Must be enrolled in a BS/MS/PhD program.

title: Data Scientist Intern
description: Drive product and business decisions through rigorous data analysis and experimentation. Work on ads, integrity, or core product analytics. Requirements: Pursuing advanced degree in Statistics, Economics, or CS, strong SQL and Python skills, experience with A/B testing.

title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Create the next generation of Apple products. Join teams working on iOS, macOS, or hardware/software integration. Looking for passion for technology, strong programming fundamentals, and creative problem-solving abilities.

title: Machine Learning / AI Intern
description: Work on Siri, computer vision, and ML infrastructure powering Apple devices. Build models that run efficiently on device. Requirements: Pursuing MS/PhD in ML/AI, experience with PyTorch or TensorFlow, strong math and programming skills.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Work on products that empower every person and organization. Teams include Azure, Office, Windows, and Xbox. Requirements: Enrolled in BS/MS program, coding experience in C#, C++, Java, or Python, passion for technology.

title: Data & Applied Science Intern
description: Apply machine learning and data science to improve Microsoft products. Work on search, recommendations, and intelligent features. Requirements: Pursuing MS/PhD in CS, Statistics, or related field, experience with Python, R, and ML frameworks.

title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Build the streaming platform that entertains 250M+ members worldwide. Work on personalization, streaming infrastructure, or studio technology. Requirements: Strong CS fundamentals, experience with Java, Python, or JavaScript.

title: Data Science Intern
description: Use data to shape content strategy and improve member experience. Work on causal inference, experimentation, and ML models. Requirements: Pursuing advanced degree in Statistics or related field, Python and SQL proficiency, strong communication skills.

title: Backend Engineering Intern
description: Build the economic infrastructure for the internet. Work on APIs that power millions of businesses. Looking for strong fundamentals in distributed systems, databases, and API design. Ruby, Go, or Java experience preferred.

title: Data Scientist Intern
description: Use data to detect fraud, optimize pricing, and improve the Stripe platform. Work on ML models that process billions of transactions. Requirements: Pursuing degree in quantitative field, Python and SQL skills, ML experience.

title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Work on GPU computing, AI infrastructure, and deep learning frameworks. Build technology powering the AI revolution. Requirements: Strong C/C++ skills, CUDA experience a plus, pursuing degree in CS or EE.

title: Deep Learning Data Scientist Intern
description: Push the boundaries of AI research and apply it to real products. Work on LLMs, computer vision, and autonomous systems. Requirements: Pursuing MS/PhD in ML/AI, publications preferred, PyTorch experience required.

title: Machine Learning Engineering Intern
description: Work on the cutting edge of AI research and deployment. Help build safe and beneficial AI systems. Requirements: Strong ML fundamentals, experience with PyTorch or TensorFlow, research or project experience in AI.

title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Build the unified analytics platform. Work on infrastructure that processes petabytes of data. Requirements: Experience with Scala, Python, or Java, understanding of distributed systems, interest in big data and ML.

title: Data Science Intern
description: Use data to improve the travel experience for millions of guests and hosts. Work on search ranking, pricing algorithms, and experimentation. Requirements: Pursuing advanced degree, strong SQL and Python, statistical modeling experience.

title: Software Development Engineer Intern
description: Build the #1 CRM platform used by companies worldwide. Work on cloud infrastructure, AI features, or core platform. Requirements: Pursuing CS degree, Java or Python experience, strong problem-solving skills.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Join Ramp to build the future of corporate finance. Work on our spend management platform used by 25,000+ businesses. You'll ship real features to production and work with a world-class engineering team. Requirements: Strong CS fundamentals, experience with TypeScript, Python, or Go, passion for fintech and startups.
